column1: How often do you feel anxious or stressed?
Do you have difficulty sleeping?
How often do you experience feelings of sadness or hopelessness?
Do you have trouble concentrating?
Have you ever had thoughts of self-harm or suicide?
Do you often experience physical symptoms such as headaches or stomachaches?
How often do you feel overwhelmed?
Do you have a support system that you can turn to in times of stress?
Have you ever sought help from a mental health professional?
How often do you engage in activities that bring you joy?
On a scale of 1 to 10-how would you rate your current level of stress?
Have you been sleeping well lately?
Have you been eating healthy and regularly?
Have you been experiencing any physical symptoms
Have you been able to focus on your work or other activities?
Have you been feeling motivated to get things done?
Have you been feeling anxious or worried about anything in particular?
Have you been feeling sad or hopeless lately?
Have you been enjoying things that you used to find enjoyable?
Have you been spending time with friends or family recently?
Have you been engaging in any physical activity or exercise?
Have you been experiencing any mood swings or changes in your emotions?
Have you been using any coping strategies to deal with stress or negative emotions?
Have you been able to maintain a positive outlook on life?
Have you been experiencing any major life changes or stressors lately?
What activities do you engage in when you are feeling stressed?
Do you feel like you have a good work-life balance? Why or why not?
What are some things you can do to take care of your mental health?
What are some things you are grateful for today?
What are some things you can do to improve your mood when you are feeling down?
